title: Connecting Dots and Unassuming Assumptions
summary: Can you connect 9 dots with just 4 lines? This decepitvely simple puzzle can teach us a lot about assumptions and creative problem solving.
long_summary: The 9-Dots is simple: connect all 9 dots with 4 connected lines. But in spite of its simplicity, it is very hard to solve. Let's find out why the 9-Dots puzzle is so hard to solve and see how we can use it to improve our creative problem solving abilities!
